alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 5:43PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL WALTON AND WEST CENTRAL WASHINGTON COUNTIES THROUGH 530 PM CDT... At 443 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles southeast of De Funiak Springs, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Eglin Air Force Base, Eucheeanna, Knox Hill, Red Bay, Douglass Crossroad, and Rock Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
